member.name: M:Enowitsoft.Net.Email.MimeAttachmentList.Unique(Enowitsoft.Net.Email.MimeAttachmentList)
member.summary: Returns a wrapper for the specified ensuring that all elements are unique.
member.returns: A wrapper around ensuring that all elements are unique.
member.exception: contains duplicate elements.
is a null reference.

remarks.para: The Unique wrapper provides a set-like collection by ensuring that all elements in the are unique.
Unique raises an if the specified contains any duplicate elements. The returned wrapper raises a whenever the user attempts to add an element that is already contained in the MimeAttachmentList.

Note: The Unique wrapper reflects any changes made to the underlying , including the possible creation of duplicate elements. The uniqueness of all elements is therefore no longer assured if the underlying collection is manipulated directly.

member.name: P:Enowitsoft.Net.Email.MimeAttachmentList.InnerArray
member.summary: Gets the list of elements contained in the instance.
member.value: A one-dimensional with zero-based indexing that contains all elements in the .
member.remarks: Use InnerArray to access the element array of a instance that might be a read-only or synchronized wrapper. This is necessary because the element array field of wrapper classes is always a null reference.

example.code:
MimeMessage m = MessageBuilder (<test@toto.com>,<test2@tyty.com>,"Test","This is a test", MimeTextContentType.TextPlain);
Smtp.Send (m);

member.name: M:Enowitsoft.Net.Email.POP3Client.GetStat
member.returns: A string containing the server answer
member.remarks:
The STAT command return the current details of the connected mailbox. in the form :
+OK nnn BBBB where nnn indicate the number of messages in the mailbox and BBBB the total number of bytes in mailbox
member.exception: Raise in case of communication error
Raise if the server return an error condition

member.name: M:Enowitsoft.Net.Email.POP3Client.SendLogin(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Send user login and password to the server

Raise if the server return an error condition

member.name: M:Enowitsoft.Net.Email.POP3Client.GetList
member.remarks:
The LIST command return the current contents of the connected mailbox. in the form of a block of lines. for each messages in mailbox the line as the form :
+OK nnn BBBB where nnn indicate the message number in the mailbox and BBBB the message size in Bytes
member.returns: A string containing the server answer
member.exception: Raise in case of communication error
Raise if the server return an error condition

Message number
The server answer

member.name: M:Enowitsoft.Net.Email.POP3Client.GetUidl

The server return a list of unique identifier for all message in mailbox.
